resources.string: The Arc de Triomphe is a famous monument located in Paris, France. This Landmark is located on the western end of the Champs-Elysees. It honours the lost soldiers from the French revolutionary war and Napoleonic wars

The Sydney Opera House is a famous performing arts centre located at the Sydney Harbour. Designed by danish architect Jorn Utzon. This is one of the foremost attractions of the capital city of New South Wales
The Colosseum is an oval amphitheatre in the city of Rome, Italy. The site used to hold all forms of spectacles from gladiatorial battles to mock sea battles.

Petra is a historic city in southern Jordan. The city is carved into the rock and is also famous for its water conduit system. Petra is also called the "Rose City" due to the colour of the stone from which it is carved.
